#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
string s1,s2;
cin>>s1>>s2;
if(s1.length()==s2.length())
{int count=0;
sort(s1.begin(),s1.end());
sort(s2.begin(),s2.end());
for(int i=0;i<s1.length();i++)
{
if(s1[i]==s2[i])
count++;
else
break;
}
if(count==s1.length())
cout<<"YES"<<endl;
else
cout<<"NO"<<endl;
}
else
cout<<"NO"<<endl;
}
}
